ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.impl

Class BasicEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.AbstractEncoder
      • ctu.nengoros.comm.rosBackend.encoders.impl.BasicEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resettable, Termination, Encoder, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class BasicEncoder
extends AbstractEncoder

    Each NeuralModule can have one or more Encoders and Decoders.

    This is basic implementation of Encoder, which implement a Termination. Values received on this Termination are encoded into ROS messages and sent over the ROS network on the topic generated from the Termination name.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • BasicEncoder

        public BasicEncoder(Node node,
            DynamicalSystem dynamics,
            Integrator integrator,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String dataType,
            Units u,
            ModemContainer modem,
            Backend ros)
             throws StructuralException
        Create BasicEncoder with dimension sizes determined by the ROS message type.
        Parameters:
        node - parent of this Termination
        dynamics - DynamicalSystem defining properties of the input
        integrator - Integrator defining properties of the input
        name - name of this Encoder
        dataType - determines type of data to be encoded to the ROS network
        u - Nengo Units
        modem - a ROS node which registers ROS Publishers/Subscribers for the ROS communication
        ros - Backend that is used for direct communication with ROS infrastructure (e.g. encode/send)
        Throws:
        StructuralException

      • BasicEncoder

        public BasicEncoder(Node node,
            DynamicalSystem dynamics,
            Integrator integrator,
            java.lang.String name,
            int[] dimensionSizes,
            java.lang.String dataType,
            Units u,
            ModemContainer modem,
            Backend ros)
             throws StructuralException
        Create BesicEncoder with given dimension sizes.
        Parameters:
        node - parent of this Termination
        dynamics - DynamicalSystem defining properties of the input
        integrator - Integrator defining properties of the input
        name - name of this Encoder
        dimensionSizes - array defining sizes of ROS message dimensions (to be translated into vector of floats for Nengo)
        dataType - determines type of data to be encoded to the ROS network
        u - Nengo Units
        modem - a ROS node which registers ROS Publishers/Subscribers for the ROS communication
        ros - Backend that is used for direct communication with ROS infrastructure (e.g. encode/send)
        Throws:
        StructuralException

      • reset

        public void reset(boolean randomize)
        Specified by:
        reset in interface Resettable
        Specified by:
        reset in class AbstractEncoder
        Parameters:
        randomize - True indicates that the object should be reset to a randomly selected initial state (the object must be aware of the distribution from which to draw from). False indicates that the object should be reset to a fixed initial state (which it must also know). Some objects may not support randomization of the initial state, in which case a fixed state will be used in either case.
        See Also:
        Resettable.reset(boolean)
